name: nocss
description: A revolutionary CSS framework that styles your HTML based on structure, not classes

scripts.dev: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: postcss src/nocss.css -o dist/nocss.css && postcss src/nocss.css -o dist/nocss.min.css --env production
